The appropriate medication use in pregnancy should follow the USFDA drug risk category. This classification explains 
about the A, B, C, D, X and N categories which specify the safety profile of various medications of each category, where 
drugs of category A are considered the safest and category X drugs are contraindicated in pregnancy or can be also 
called as teratogenic drugs. Hence,
